body_html:
@fchollet: Well your reviews were a little unusual for me to interpret, because certain chunks of code were modified on upstream master after I submitted my patch, and before you reviewed my PR. But then I rebased my branch on master and could connect the dots. Finally I have worked on your reviews.

I had a difficulty in setting up development mode of TF, but Bazel is all up and running on my local machine. All tests pass properly locally, please initiate Jenkins builds and have a look at the modifications, thanks !

body:
@fchollet: Well your reviews were a little unusual for me to interpret, because certain chunks of code were modified on upstream master after I submitted my patch, and before you reviewed my PR. But then I rebased my branch on master and could connect the dots. Finally I have worked on your reviews.

I had a difficulty in setting up development mode of TF, but Bazel is all up and running on my local machine. All tests pass properly locally, please initiate Jenkins builds and have a look at the modifications, thanks !
